reviewText: I have invested in other Jeremiah Watt products and like in those other instances I was not the least bit disapointed. I only wish I would have had these products 20 years ago. Thank you very much.

This is a very comprehensive look at saddle making - I really like how Jeremiah goes into detail on some of the obscure points like ear cuts etc.

It was well worth the money.

R
Awesome as usual from Jeremiah Watt. He does better on instruction than anyone out there. I have other videos from him going back 20 years. Would recommend this to anyone.
Video in great condition! Very good video
I have purchased several saddle making DVDs but this one was by far the best. In this DVD Mr. Watt answered questions I had even after watching other videos.
Very Entertaining with a wealth of knowledge!
Excellent product.  Chronological and no steps skipped or glossed over.  Mr. Watt also provides helpful tips and commentary throughout.  Easily worth the purchase price.
Great video. More NEW than used!
This series on saddke making is the best I have ever seen.  I speak with 50 years of saddle making experience
Lessons from a master.  Great information for both newbie and experienced people as well.

I love this dvd as it gave me exactly what I was looking for. Detailed information on designing and making a western saddle. From choosing proper parts of leather, making own patterns, new and easy ways of measuring center lines, proper detailed construction to hand sawing, polishing and finishing the leather, Jeremiah explains it all. And also why he does it the way he does it. I recommend to everyone, who would like to improve their skills of making saddles or even to riders to appreciate the saddle maker's hard work which is involved  by making the custom western saddle
